GV05brupsb5u:13: ada iti parokṣābhidhāyi sarvanāma, tatparaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /

GV05brupsb5u:15: tadidaṃ viśeṣāpannaṃ kāryātmakaṃ brahma pūrṇāt kāraṇātmana udacyata udricyata udgacchatītyetat

GV05brupsb5u:22: idaṃ pūrṇamiti brahma vā idamagra āsīdityasyārthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:24: ato 'daḥśabdavācyaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma tadevedaṃ pūrṇaṃ kāryasthaṃ nāmarūpopādhisaṃyuktamavidyayodriktam
GV05brupsb5u:26: tadyadātmānameva paraṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma viditvāhamadaḥ pūrṇaṃ brahmāsmītyevaṃ pūrṇamādāya tiraskṛtyāpūrṇasvarūpatāmavidyākṛtāṃ nāmarūpopādhisaṃparkajāmetayā brahmavidyayā pūrṇameva kevalamavaśiṣyate /
GV05brupsb5u:28: yaḥ sarvopaniṣadartho brahma sa eṣo 'nena mantreṇānūdyata uttarasambandhārtham /
GV05brupsb5u:29: brahmavidyāsādhanatvena hi vakṣyamāṇāni sādhanānyoṅkāradamadānadayākhyāni vidhitsitāni khilaprakaraṇasambandhātsarvopāsanāṅgabhūtāni ca /
GV05brupsb5u:31: udriktaṃ kāryaṃ vartamānakāle 'pi pūrṇameva paramārthavastubhūtaṃ dvaitarūpeṇa /
GV05brupsb5u:32: punaḥ pralayakāle pūrṇasya kāryasya pūrṇatāmādāyā'tmani dhitvā pūrṇamevāvaśiṣyate kāraṇarūpam
GV05brupsb5u:37: yathā ca jalaṃ satyaṃ tadudbhavāśca taraṅgaphelabudbudādayaḥ samudrātmabhūtā evā'virbhāvatirobhāvadharmiṇaḥ paramārthasatyā eva /
GV05brupsb5u:38: evaṃ sarvamidaṃ dvaitaṃ paramārthasatyameva jalataraṅgādisthānīyaṃ samudrajalasthānīyaṃ tu paraṃ brahma /

GV05brupsb5u:41: tadvirodhaparijihīrṣayā śrutyaitaduktaṃ kāryakāraṇayoḥ satyatvaṃ samudravatpūrṇamada ityādineti
GV05brupsb5u:47: yathāhiṃsansarvabhūtānyanyatra tīrthebhya iti hiṃsā sarvabhūtaviṣayotsargeṇa nivāritā tīrthe viśiṣṭaviṣaye jyotiṣṭomādāvanujñāyate /
GV05brupsb5u:48: na ca tathā vastuviṣaya ihādvaitaṃ brahmotsargeṇa pratipādya punastadekadeśe 'pavadituṃ śakyate
GV05brupsb5u:51: yathātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti nātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇātīti grahaṇāgrahaṇayoḥ puruṣādhīnatvādvikalpo bhavati /
GV05brupsb5u:52: na tviha tathā vastuviṣaye dvaitaṃ vā syādadvaitaṃ veti vikalpaḥ sambhavatyapuruṣatantratvādātmavastunaḥ
GV05brupsb5u:56: saindhavaghanavatprajñānaikarasaghanaṃ nirantaraṃ pūrvāparabāhyābhyantarabhedavivarjitaṃ sabāhyābhyantaramajaṃ neti netyasthūlamanaṇvajamajaramabhayamamṛtamityevamādyāḥ śrutayo niścitārthāḥ saṃśayaviparyāsāśaṅkārahitāḥ sarvāḥ samudre prakṣiptāḥ syurakiñcitkaratvāt /

GV05brupsb5u:70: na hi jananamaraṇādyanarthaśatasahasrabhedasamākulaṃ samudravanādivatsāvayavamanekarasaṃ brahma dhyeyatvena vijñeyatvena vā śrutyopadiśyate /

GV05brupsb5u:75: yacca na kriyate na sa śāsrārthaḥ /

GV05brupsb5u:82: na hi dvaitamadvaitaṃ vā vastu jātamātrameva puruṣaṃ jñāpayitvā paścātkarma vā brahmavidyāṃ vopadiśati śāsram /
GV05brupsb5u:85: yena dvaitasya satyatvamupadiśya paścādātmanaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ pratipādayecchāsram /
GV05brupsb5u:86: nāpi pāṣaṇḍibhirapi prasthāpitāḥ śāsrasya prāmāṇyaṃ na gṛhṇīyuḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:87: tasmādyathāprāptameva dvaitamavidyākṛtaṃ svābhāvikamupādāya svābhāvikyaivāvidyayā yuktāya rāgadveṣādidoṣavate yathābhimatapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ karmopadiśatyagre paścātprasiddhakriyākārakaphalasvarūpadoṣadarśanavate tadbiparītaudāsīnyasvarūpāvasthānaphalārthine tadupāyabhūtāmātmaikatvadarśanātmikāṃ brahmavidyāmupadiśati athaivaṃ sati tadaudāsīnyasvarūpāvasthāne phale prāpte śāsrasya prāmāṇyaṃ pratyarthitvaṃ nivartate
GV05brupsb5u:88: tadabhāvācchāsrasyāpi śāsratvaṃ taṃ prati nivartata eva /
GV05brupsb5u:89: tathā pratipuruṣaṃ parisamāptaṃ śāsramiti na śāsravirodhagandho 'pyasti /

GV05brupsb5u:116: yadyapi brahmātmādiśabdā brahmaṇo vācakāstathāpi śrutiprāmāṇyādbrahmaṇo nediṣṭhamabhidhānamoṅkāraḥ
GV05brupsb5u:119: pratīkatvena yathā viṣṇvādipratimābhedena, evamoṅkāro brahmeti pratipattavyaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:123: tatra khamiti bhautike khe pratītirmā bhūdityāha-khaṃ purāṇaṃ ciratanaṃ khaṃ paramātmākāśamityarthaḥ
GV05brupsb5u:124: yattatparamātmākāśaṃ purāṇaṃ khaṃ taccakṣurādyaviṣayatvānnirālambanamaśakyaṃ grahītumiti śraddhābhaktibhyāṃ bhāvaviśeṣeṇa coṅkāra āveśayati /
GV05brupsb5u:125: yathā viṣṇvaṅgāṅkitāyāṃ śilādipratimāyāṃ viṣṇuṃ loka evam /
GV05brupsb5u:126: vāyuraṃ khaṃ vāyurasminvidyata iti vāyuraṃ khaṃ khamātraṃ khamityucyate na purāṇaṃ khamityevamāha sma /
GV05brupsb5u:129: vāyure hi khe mukhyaḥ svaśabdavyavahārastasmānmukhe saṃpratyayo yukta iti manyate /
GV05brupsb5u:130: tatra yadi purāṇaṃ khaṃ brahma nirūpādhisvarūpaṃ yadi vā vāyuraṃ khaṃ sopādhikaṃ brahma sarvathāpyoṅkāraḥ pratīkatvenaiva pratimāvatsādhanatvaṃ pratipadyate /
GV05brupsb5u:131: etadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkāraḥ iti śrutyantarāt /
GV05brupsb5u:135: tenābhidhānena yadveditavyaṃ brahma prakāśyamānamabhidhīyamānaṃ veda sādhako vijānātyupalabhate
GV05brupsb5u:140: oṃ khaṃ brahmeti sāmānādhikaraṇyāttasya stutiridānīṃ vedatvena /
GV05brupsb5u:142: etatprabhava etadātmakaḥ sarvaṃ ṛgyajuḥsāmādibhedabhinna eva oṅkāraḥ tadyathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi parṇāni ityādiśrutyantarāt /

GV05brupsb5u:199: kāsau stanayitnurda da da iti dāmyata datta dayadhvamityeṣāṃ vākyānāmupalakṣaṇāya trirdakāra uccāryate 'nukṛtirna tu stanayitnuśabdastrireva saṃkhyāniyamasya loko 'prasiddhatvāt /
GV05brupsb5u:201: kiṃ tat trayamityucyate damaṃ dānaṃ dayāmiti śikṣedupādadyātprajāpateranuśāsanamasmābhiḥ kartavyamityevaṃ kartavyamityevaṃ matiṃ kuryāt /
GV05brupsb5u:202: tathā ca smṛtiḥ - trividhaṃ narakasyedaṃ dvāraṃ nāśatamātmanaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:203: kāmaḥ krodhastathā lobhastasmādetat trayaṃ tyajet iti /
GV05brupsb5u:206: te vā kathaṃ vivekena pratipannāḥ prajāpatermanogataṃ samānenaiva dakāravarṇamātreṇeti parābhiprāyajñā vikalpayanti /
GV05brupsb5u:207: atraika āhuradāntatvādānātvādayāsutvairaparādhitvamātmano manyamānāḥ śaṅkitā eva prajāpatāvūṣuḥ kiṃ no vakṣyatīti /
GV05brupsb5u:209: loke 'pi hi prasiddhaṃ putrāḥ śiṣyāścānuśāsyāḥ santo doṣānnivartayitavyā iti /

GV05brupsb5u:237: tatra nirupādhikasya brahmaṇo darśanamatikrāntamathādhunā sopādhikasya tasyaivābhyudayaphalāni vaktavyānītyevamartho 'yamārambhaḥ eṣa prajāpatiryaddhṛśyaṃ prajāpatiranuśāstītyanantaramevābhihitam kaḥ punarasāvanuśāstā prajāpatiriti /
GV05brupsb5u:240: yasmiñśākalyabrāhmaṇānte nāmarūpakarmaṇāmupasaṃhāra ukto digvibhāgadvāreṇa tadetatsarvabhūtapratiṣṭhaṃ sarvabhūtātmabhūtaṃ hṛdayaṃ prajāpatiḥ prajānāṃ sraṣṭā /
GV05brupsb5u:249: abhiharanti hṛterāhṛtikarmaṇo hṛ ityetadrūpamiti yo veda yasmāddhṛdayāya brahmaṇe svāścendriyāṇyanye ca viṣayāḥ śabdādayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ kāryamabhiharantihṛdayaṃ ca bhoktrarthamabhiharati /
GV05brupsb5u:250: ato hṛdayanāmno hṛ ityetadakṣaramiti yo vedāsmai viduṣe 'bhiharanti svāśca jñātayo 'nye cāsaṃbaddhāḥ
GV05brupsb5u:253: tathā da ityetadapyekākṣarametadapi dānārthasya dadāterda ityetadrūpaṃ hṛdayanāmākṣaratvena nibaddham /
GV05brupsb5u:254: atrāpi hṛdayāya brahmaṇo svāśca karaṇānyanye ca viṣayāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vīryaṃ dadati hṛdayaṃ ca bhoktre dadāti svaṃ vīryamato dakāra ityevaṃ yo vedāsmai dadati svāścānye ca /
GV05brupsb5u:256: iṇo gatyarthasya yamityetadrūpamasminnāmni nibaddhamiti yo veda sa svargaṃ lokameti /
GV05brupsb5u:257: evaṃ nāmākṣarādapīdṛśaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti kimu vaktavyaṃ hṛdayasvarūpo pāsanāditi hṛdayastutaye nāmākṣaropanyāsaḥ //1//

GV05brupsb5u:262: sa yo haitaṃ mahad yakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ brahmeti jayatīmāṃl lokān -- jita in nv asāv asat -- ya evam etan mahad yakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ

GV05brupsb5u:334: tadetadanṛtaṃ takārākṣaraṃ mṛtyurūpamubhayataḥ satyena sakārayakāralakṣaṇena parigṛhotaṃvyāptamantarbhāvitaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:336: evaṃ satyabāhulyaṃ sarvasya mṛtyoranṛtasyākiñcitkaratvaṃ ca yo vidvāṃstamevaṃ vidvāṃsamanṛtaṃ kadācitpramādoktaṃ na hinasti //1//
GV05brupsb5u:338: tad yat tat satyam asau sa ādityaḥ |
GV05brupsb5u:339: ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣo yaś cāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣas tāv etāv
GV05brupsb5u:341: raśmibhir eṣo 'smin pratiṣṭhitaḥ prāṇair ayam amuṣmin |
GV05brupsb5u:342: sa yadotkramiṣyan bhavati śuddham evaitan maṇḍalaṃ paśyati |
GV05brupsb5u:346: kiṃ tatsatyaṃ brahma prathamajaṃ kimasau saḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:347: ko 'sāvādityaḥ kaḥ punarasāvādityo ya eṣa ka eṣa ya etasminnādityamaṇḍale puruṣo 'bhimānī so 'sau satyaṃ brahma /
GV05brupsb5u:353: kathaṃ pratiṣṭhitāvityucyate raśmibhiḥ prakāśenānugrahaṃ kurvanneṣa ādityo
GV05brupsb5u:357: so 'smiñcharīre vijñānamayo bhoktā yadā yasminkāla utkramiṣyanbhavati tadāsau cākṣuṣa ādityapuruṣo raśmīnupasaṃhṛtya kevalenaudāsīnyena rūpeṇa
GV05brupsb5u:359: tadāyaṃ vijñānamayaḥ paśyati śuddhameva kevalaṃ viraśmyetanmaṇḍalaṃ candramaṇḍalamiva /
GV05brupsb5u:362: nainaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ puruṣamurarīkṛtya taṃ pratyanugrahāyaite raśmayaḥ svāmikartavyavaśātpūrvamāgacchanto 'pi punastatkarmakṣayamanurudhyamānā iva nopayanti na pratyāgacchantyenam /
GV05brupsb5u:366: ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣas tasya bhūr iti śiraḥ |
GV05brupsb5u:373: hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_5,5.3 ||

GV05brupsb5u:377: bhūriti yeyaṃ vyāhṛtiḥ sā tasya śiraḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:381: bhuva iti bāhū dvitvasāmānyāddvau bāhū dve ete akṣare /
GV05brupsb5u:382: tathā svariti pratiṣṭhā dve pratiṣṭhe dve ete akṣare /

GV05brupsb5u:404: tasminn antar hṛdaye yathā vrīhir vā yavo vā |
GV05brupsb5u:405: sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvam idaṃ praśāsti yad idaṃ kiñca
GV05brupsb5u:408: manasā copalabhata iti manomayo 'yaṃ puruṣo bhāḥ satyo bhā eva satyaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:409: sadbhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ bhāḥ satyo bhāsvara ityetat /
GV05brupsb5u:412: yathā vrīhirvā yavo vā pariṇamata evaṃ parimāṇastasminnantarhṛdaye yogibhirdṛśyata ityarthaḥ
GV05brupsb5u:413: sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasya svabhedajātasyeśānaḥ svāmī /
GV05brupsb5u:414: svāmitve 'pi sati kaścidamātyāditantro 'yaṃ tu na tathā kiṃ tarhyadhipatiradhiṣṭhāya pālayitā
GV05brupsb5u:415: sarvamidaṃ praśāsti yadidaṃ kiñca yatkiñccitsarvaṃ jagattatsarvaṃ praśāsti
GV05brupsb5u:417: taṃ tathā yathepāsate tadeva bhavatīti brāhmaṇam //1//
GV05brupsb5u:422: vidyaty enaṃ pāpmano ya evaṃ veda vidyud brahmeti |
GV05brupsb5u:426: vidyuto brahmaṇo nirvacanamucyate - vidānādavakhaṇḍanāttamaso medhāndhakāraṃ vidārya hyavabhāsate 'to vidyut /
GV05brupsb5u:427: evaṃ guṇaṃ vidyudbrahmeti yo vedāsai vidyatyavakhaṇḍayati vināśayati pāpmana enamātmānaṃ prati pratikūlabhūtāḥ pāpmāno ye tānsarvānpāpmano 'khaṇḍayatītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:428: ya evaṃ veda vidyudbrahmeti tasyānurūpaṃ phalam /

GV05brupsb5u:441: śabdasrayī tāṃ vācaṃ dhenuṃ dhenuriva dhenuryathā dhenuścaturbhiḥ stanaiḥ stanyaṃ payaḥ kṣarati vatsāyaivaṃ vāgdhenurvakṣyamāṇaiḥ stanaiḥ paya ivānnaṃ kṣarati devādibhyaḥ /

GV05brupsb5u:452: hanteti manuṣyebhyo 'nnaṃ prayacchanti svadhākāraṃ ca vaṣaṭkāraṃ ca /
GV05brupsb5u:467: ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣe |
GV05brupsb5u:472: sa yadotkramiṣyan bhavati nainaṃ ghoṣaṃ śṛṇoti || BrhUp_5,9.1 ||
GV05brupsb5u:480: yaṃ ghoṣametaditi kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ karṇāvapidhāyāṅgulībhyāmapidhānaṃ kṛtvā śṛṇoti taṃ prajāpatimupāsīta vaiśvānaramagnim /
GV05brupsb5u:482: tatra prāsaṅgikamidamariṣṭalakṣaṇamucyate-so 'tra śarīre bhoktā yadotkramiṣyanbhavati nainaṃ ghoṣaṃ śṛṇoti //1//
GV05brupsb5u:485: yadā vai puruṣo 'smāl lokāt praiti sa vāyum āgacchati |
GV05brupsb5u:486: tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya kham |
GV05brupsb5u:499: cocyate-yadā vai puruṣo vidvānasmāllokātpraiti śarīraṃ parityajati sa tadā vāyumāgacchatyantarikṣe tiryagbhūto vāyuḥ stimito 'bhedyastiṣṭhati /
GV05brupsb5u:500: sa vāyustatra svātmani tasmai samprāptāya vijihote svātmāvayavānvigamayati cchidrīkarotyātmānamityarthaḥ
GV05brupsb5u:502: ucyate-yathā ratha vakrasya khaṃ chidraṃ prasiddhaparimāṇam /
GV05brupsb5u:503: tena chidreṇa sa vidvānūrdhva ākramata ūrdhvaḥ sangacchati sa ādityamāgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:504: ādityo brahmalokaṃ jigamiṣormārganirodhaṃ kṛtvā sthitaḥ so 'pyevaṃvida

GV05brupsb5u:509: yathā dundubheḥ khaṃ prasiddhaṃ tena sa ūrdhva ākramate sa lokaṃ prajāpatilokamāgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:513: taṃ prāpya tasminvasati śāśvatīrnityāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarānityarthaḥ /

GV05brupsb5u:520: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda |

GV05brupsb5u:532: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda //1//
GV05brupsb5u:541: ete ha tv eva devate ekadhābhūyaṃ bhūtvā paramatāṃ gacchataḥ |
GV05brupsb5u:543: kiṃ svid evaivaṃ viduṣe sādhu kuryāṃ kim evāsmā asādhu kuryām iti |
GV05brupsb5u:544: sa ha smāha pāṇinā mā prātṛda |
GV05brupsb5u:545: kas tv enayor ekadhābhūyaṃ bhūtvā paramatāṃ gacchatīti |
GV05brupsb5u:552: sarvāṇi ha vā asmin bhūtāni viśanti |

GV05brupsb5u:555: tathaitadupāsanāntaraṃ vidhitsannāha-annaṃ brahmānnamadyate yattadbrahmetyeka ācāryā āhustanna tathā grahītavyamannaṃ brahmeti /

GV05brupsb5u:567: tadetadevamadhyavasya ha smā'ha sma prātṛdo nāma pitarātmanaḥ kiṃsviditisviditi vitarke /

GV05brupsb5u:570: annaprāṇau sahabhūto brahmeti vidvānnāsāvasādhukaramena khaṇḍito bhavati /

GV05brupsb5u:573: kastvenayorannaprāṇayorekadhābhūyaṃ bhūtvā paramatāṃ kastu gacchati na kaścidapi vidvānanena brahmadarśanena paramatāṃ gacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:581: anne hi yasmādimāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni viṣṭānyāśritānyato 'nnaṃ vītyucyate /
GV05brupsb5u:589: yadā tvāyatanavānprāṇī balavāṃśca tadā kṛtārthamātmānaṃ manyamāno ramate lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:591: idānīmevaṃvidaḥ phalamāha - sarvāṇi ha vā asminbhūtāni viśantyannaguṇajñānātsarvāṇi bhūtāni ramante prāṇaguṇajñānādya evaṃ veda
GV05brupsb5u:598: ukthasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_5,13.1 ||

GV05brupsb5u:651: kṣattrasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda //4//
GV05brupsb5u:654: bhūmir antarikṣaṃ dyaur ity aṣṭāv akṣarāṇi |

GV05brupsb5u:662: prāṇātmabhūtā ca sā sarvacchandasāṃ cā'tmā prāṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:667: gāyatryā brāhmaṇamasṛjata triṣṭubhā rājanyaṃ jagatyā vaiśyamati dvijottamasya dvitīyaṃ janma gāyatrīnimittam /
GV05brupsb5u:668: tasmātpradhānā gāyatrī brāhmaṇā vyutthāya brāhmaṇā abhivadanti sa brāhmaṇo vipāpo virajo 'vicikitso brāhmaṇo bhavatītyuttamapuruṣārthasaṃbandhaṃ brāhmaṇasya darśayati /
GV05brupsb5u:669: tacca brāhmaṇatvaṃ gāyatrījanmamūlamato vaktavyaṃ gāyatryāḥ satattvam /

GV05brupsb5u:677: etadu haivaitadevāsyā gāyatryāḥ padaṃ pādaḥ prathamo bhūmyādilakṣaṇasrailokyātmā /

GV05brupsb5u:703: turīyamityādivākyapadārthaṃ svameva vyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-yadvai caturthaṃ prasiddhaṃ loke tadidaṃ turīyaśabdenābhidhīyate /

GV05brupsb5u:710: “ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakānāṃ ca”iti śrutyanrāt /

GV05brupsb5u:732: BrhUpBh_5,14.4 saiṣā tripadoktā yā trailokyatraividyaprāṇalakṣaṇā gāyatryetasmiṃścaturthe turīye darśate pade parorajasi pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:739: tathā mūrtāmūrtātmakaṃ jagattripadā gāyatryāditye pratiṣṭhitā tadrasatvātsaha tribhiḥ pādaiḥ
GV05brupsb5u:744: vadamānāveyātāmāgaccheyātāmahamadarśaṃ dṛṣṭavānanasmītyanya āhāhamaśrauṣaṃ tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ na tathā tadvastviti tayorya evaṃ brūyādahamadrākṣamiti tasmā eva śraddadhyāma napunaryo brūyādahamaśrauṣamiti śroturmṛṣā śravaṇamapi saṃbhavati na tu cakṣuṣo mṛṣā darśanam /
GV05brupsb5u:746: tasmātsatyapratipattihetutvātsatyaṃ cakṣustasminsatye cakṣuṣi saha tribhiritaraiḥ pādaisturīyaṃ padaṃ pratiṣṭhitamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:747: uktaṃ ca sa ādityaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti cakṣuṣīti /
GV05brupsb5u:749: kiṃ punastadbalamityāha-prāṇo vai balaṃ tasminprāṇe bale pratiṣṭhitaṃ satyam /
GV05brupsb5u:750: tathā coktaṃ sūtre tadotaṃ ca protaṃ ceti /
GV05brupsb5u:751: yasmādbale satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tasmādāhurbalaṃ satyādogīya ojīya ojastaramityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:752: loke 'pi yasminhi yadāśritaṃ bhavati tasmādāśritādāśrayasya balavattaratvaṃ prasiddham /
GV05brupsb5u:753: na hi durbalaṃ balavataḥ kvacidāśrayabhūtaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GV05brupsb5u:754: evamuktanyāyena u eṣā gāyatryadhyātmamadhyātme prāṇe pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:758: sarvaṃ vedāḥ karmāṇi phalaṃ ca saivaṃ gāyatrī prāṇarūpā satī jagata ātmā /
GV05brupsb5u:760: ke punargayāḥ prāṇā vāgādayo vai gayāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:765: sa ācārya upanīya māṇavakamaṣṭavarṣaṃ yāmevāmūṃ gāyatrīṃ sāvitrīṃ savitṛdevatākāmanvāha pacchordharcaśaḥ samastāṃ ca /
GV05brupsb5u:766: eṣaiva sā sākṣātprāṇo jagata ātmā māṇavakāya samarpitehedānīṃ vyākhyātā nānyā sa ācāryo yasmai māṇavakāyānvāhānuvakti tasya māṇavakasya gayānprāṇāṃsrāyate narakādipatanāt //4//
GV05brupsb5u:768: tāṃ haitām eke sāvitrīm anuṣṭubham anvāhuḥ |
GV05brupsb5u:773: yadi ha vā apy evaṃvid bahv iva pratigṛhṇāti na haiva tad gāyatryā ekaṃ cana padaṃ prati || BrhUpBh_5,14.5 tāmetāṃ sāvitrīṃ haike śākhino
GV05brupsb5u:776: vākca śarīre sarasvatī tāmeva hi vācaṃ sarasvatīṃ māṇavakāyānubrūma ityetadvadantaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:777: na tathā kuryānna tathā vidyādyatta āhurmṛṣaiva tat /
GV05brupsb5u:781: prāṇa ukte vākca sarasvatī cānye ta prāṇāḥ sarvaṃ māṇavakāya samarpitaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb5u:782: kiñcedaṃ prāsaṅgikamuktvā gāyatrīvidaṃ stauti-yadi ha vā apyevaṃvidbahviva
GV05brupsb5u:783: na hi tasya sarvātmano bahu nāmāsti kicitsarvātmakatvādviduṣaḥ pratigṛhṇāti na haiva tatpratigrahajātaṃ gāyatryā ekañcanaikamapi padaṃ prati paryāptam //5//
GV05brupsb5u:785: sa ya imāṃs trīṃl lokān pūrṇān pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat prathamaṃ padam
GV05brupsb5u:787: atha yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etad dvitīyaṃ padam āpnuyāt
GV05brupsb5u:788: atha yāvad idaṃ prāṇi yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat tṛtīyaṃ padam
GV05brupsb5u:790: athāsyā etad eva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati |
GV05brupsb5u:793: BrhUpBh_5,14.6 sa ya imāṃsrīnsa yo gāyatrīvidimānbhūrādīṃsrīngo 'śvādidhanapūrṇāṃllokānpratigṛhṇīyātsa pratigraho 'syā gāyatryā etatprathamaṃ padaṃ yadvyākhyātamāpnuyātprathamapadavijñānaphalaṃ tena bhuktaṃ syānna tvadhikadoṣotpādakaḥ sa pratigrahaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:794: atha punaryāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā yastāvatpratigṛhṇīyātso 'syā etattṛtīyaṃ padamāpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb5u:797: pādatrayasamamapi yadi kaścitpratigṛhṇīyāttatpādatrayavijñānaphalasyaiva kṣayakāraṇaṃ na tvanyasya doṣasya kartṛtve kṣamam /
GV05brupsb5u:800: dātā pratigrahītā ca yadyapyevaṃ saṃbhāvyate nāsau pratigraho
GV05brupsb5u:803: athāsyā etadeva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:804: yaccaitannaiva kenacana kenacidapi pratigraheṇā'pyaṃ naiva prāpyamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:806: etānyapi naivā'pyāni kenacitkalpayitvaivamuktaṃ paramārthataḥ kuta u etāvatpratigṛhṇoyāttrailokyādisamam
GV05brupsb5u:810: gāyatry asy ekapadī dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadi |
GV05brupsb5u:813: namas te turīyāya darśatāya padāya parorajase |
GV05brupsb5u:815: yaṃ dviṣyād asāv asmai kāmo mā samardhīti vā |
GV05brupsb5u:816: na haivāsmai sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate yasmā evam upatiṣṭhate |
GV05brupsb5u:817: aham adaḥ prāpam iti vā || BrhUp_5,14.7 ||
GV05brupsb5u:818: BrhUpBh_5,14.7 tasyā upasthānaṃ tasyā gāyatryā upasthānamupetya sthānaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:820: kau'sau mantra ityāha-he gāyatryasi bhavasi trailokyapādenaikapadī
GV05brupsb5u:824: evaṃ caturbhiḥ pādairupāsakaiḥ padyase jñāyase 'taḥ paraṃ pareṇa nirupādhikena svenā'tmanāpadasi
GV05brupsb5u:825: avidyamānaṃ padaṃ yasyāstava yena padyase sā tvamapadasi yasmānnahi padyase neti netyātmatvāt
GV05brupsb5u:826: ato vyavahāraviṣayāya namabhte turīyāya darśatāya padāya poradase /
GV05brupsb5u:827: asau śatruḥ pāpmā tvatprāptivighnakaro 'dastadātmanaḥ kāryaṃ yattvatprāptivighnakartṛtvaṃ mā prāpanmaiva prāpnotu /
GV05brupsb5u:829: yaṃ dviṣyādyaṃ prati dveṣaṃ kuryātsvayaṃ vidvāṃstaṃ pratyanenopasthānamasau śatruramukanāmeti nāma gṛhṇīyādasmai yajñadattāyābhipretaḥ kāmo mā samṛddhi samṛddhiṃ mā prāpnotviti vopatiṣṭhate na haivāsmai devadattāya sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate /
GV05brupsb5u:833: asāvado mā prāpadityāditrayāṇāṃ mantrapadānāṃ yathākāmaṃ vikalpaḥ //7//
GV05brupsb5u:835: etad dha vai taj janako vaideho buḍilam āśvatarāśvim uvāca -- yan nu ho
GV05brupsb5u:838: mukhaṃ hy asyāḥ samrāṇ na vidāṃ cakareti hovāca |
GV05brupsb5u:840: yadi ha vā api bahv ivāgnāv abhyādadhati sarvam eva tat saṃdahati |
GV05brupsb5u:841: evaṃ haivaivaṃvid yady api bahv iva pāpaṃ kurute sarvam eva tat saṃpsāya śuddhaḥ pūto 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ saṃbhavati || BrhUp_5,14.8 ||
GV05brupsb5u:842: BrhUpBh_5,14.8 gāyatryā mukhavidhānāyārthavāda ucyate-etaddha kila vai smaryate /
GV05brupsb5u:843: tattatra gāyatrīvijñānaviṣaye janako vaideho buḍilo nāmato
GV05brupsb5u:845: yannu iti vitarke ho aho ityetattadyattvaṃ gāyatrīvidbrūthā gāyatrīvidasmīti yadabrūthāḥ kimidaṃ tasya vacaso 'nanurūpam /
GV05brupsb5u:846: atha kathaṃ yadi gāyatrīvitpratigrahadoṣeṇa hastobhūto vahasīti /
GV05brupsb5u:847: sa pratyāha rājñā smārito mukhaṃ gāyatryā hi yasmādasyā he samrāṇna vidāñcakāra na vijñātavānasmīti hovāca /
GV05brupsb5u:849: śṛṇu tarhi tasyā gāyatryā agnireva mukham /
GV05brupsb5u:850: yadi ha vā api bahvivendhanamagnāvabhyādadhati laukikāḥ sarvameva tatsaṃdahatyevendhanamagnirevaṃ haivaivaṃvidgāyatryā agnirmukhamityevaṃ vettītyevaṃvitsyātsvayaṃ gāyatryātmāgnimukhaḥ san yadyapi bahviva pāpaṃ kurute pratigrahādidoṣaṃ tatsarvaṃ pāpajātaṃ saṃpsāya bhakṣayitvā śuddho
GV05brupsb5u:855: tat tvam pūṣann apāvṛṇu satyadharmāya dṛṣṭaye |
GV05brupsb5u:856: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ |
GV05brupsb5u:857: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamam tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi
GV05brupsb5u:858: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram |
GV05brupsb5u:859: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara |
GV05brupsb5u:860: agne naya supathā rāye 'smān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān |
GV05brupsb5u:861: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema ||
GV05brupsb5u:862: BrhUpBh_5,15.1 yo jñānakarmasamuccayakārī so 'ntakāla ādityaṃ prārthayati /
GV05brupsb5u:863: asti ca prasaṅgo gāyatryāsturīyaḥ pādo hi saḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:865: hiraṇyamayena jyotirmayena pātreṇa yathā pātreṇeṣṭaṃ vastvapidhīyata evamidaṃ satyākhyaṃ brahma jyotirmayena maṇḍalenāpihitamivāsamāhitacetasāmadṛśyatvāttaducyate /
GV05brupsb5u:866: satyasyāpihitaṃ mukhaṃ mukhyaṃ svarūpaṃ tadapidhānaṃ pātramapidhānamiva darśanapratibandhakāraṇaṃ tattvaṃ he pūṣañjagataḥ poṣaṇatpūṣā savitāpāvṛṇvapāvṛtaṃ kuru darśanapratibandhakāraṇamapanayetyarthaḥ satyadharmāya satyaṃ dharmo 'sya mama so 'haṃ satyadharmā tasmai tvadātmabhūtāyetyarthaḥ
GV05brupsb5u:870: sa hi sarvasya jagata ātmā cakṣuśca sansarvaṃ paśyatyeko vā
GV05brupsb5u:872: yama sarvaṃ hi jagataḥ saṃyamanaṃ tvatkṛtam /
GV05brupsb5u:873: sūrya suṣṭhu vīrayate rasānraśmīnprāṇāndhiyo vā jagata iti /
GV05brupsb5u:874: prājāpatya prajāpaterīśvarasyāpatyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhasya vā he prājāpatya vyūha vigamaya raśmīn
GV05brupsb5u:875: samūha saṃkṣipā'tmanastejo yenāhaṃ śaknuyāṃ tvatsvarūpamañjasā draṣṭam /
GV05brupsb5u:877: yatte tava rūpaṃ sarvakalyāṇānāmatiśayena kalyāṇaṃ kalyāṇatamaṃ tatte paśyāmi /
GV05brupsb5u:881: aharamiti copaniṣada uktatvādādityacākṣuṣayostadevedaṃ parāmṛśyate so 'hamasmyamṛtamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:882: mamāmṛtasya satyasya śarīrapāte śarīrastho yaḥ prāṇo vāyuḥ so 'nilaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:884: tathānyā devatāḥ svāṃ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gacchantu /
GV05brupsb5u:891: he oṃ he krato smara smartavyamantakāle hi tvatsmaraṇavaśādiṣṭā gatiḥ prāpyate 'taḥ prārthyate yanmayā kṛtaṃ tatsmara punaruktirādarārthā /
GV05brupsb5u:892: kiñca he 'gne naya prāpaya supathā śobhanena mārgeṇa rāye dhanāya karmaphalaprāptaya ityarthaḥ
GV05brupsb5u:893: na dakṣiṇena kṛṣṇena punarāvṛttiyuktena kiṃ tarhi śuklenaiva supathāsmānviśvāni sarvāṇi he deva vayunāni prajñānāni sarvaprāṇināṃ vidvān /
GV05brupsb5u:894: kiñca yuyodhyapanaya viyojayāsmadasmatto juhurāṇaṃ kuṭilamenaḥ pāpaṃ pāpajātaṃ sarvam /
GV05brupsb5u:895: tena pāpena viyuktā vayameṣyāma uttareṇa pathā tvatprasādāt /
GV05brupsb5u:896: kintu vayaṃ tubhyaṃ paricaryāṃ kartuṃ na śaknumo bhūyiṣṭhāṃ bahutamāṃ te tubhyaṃ namauktiṃ namaskāravacanaṃ vidhema namaskāroktyā paricaremetyarthaḥ /
